abstract: Choreographer Joshua Bergasse and his girlfriend, ballerina Sara Mearns, say what they love most about their one-bedroom Lincoln Square rental is corner unit's unobstructed views; apartment furnishings reflect couple's love of comfort and tchotchkes.

headline.main: Sara Mearns and Joshua Bergasse, Pirouetting on the 27th Floor

snippet: Ms. Mearns, the New York City Ballet principal dancer, and Mr. Bergasse, the Emmy-winning choreographer, at home in Lincoln Square....
lead_paragraph: Ms. Mearns, the New York City Ballet principal dancer, and Mr. Bergasse, the Emmy-winning choreographer, at home in Lincoln Square.
